about.description:
Asciimatics is a package to help people create full-screen text UIs
(from interactive forms to ASCII animations) on any platform.
about.summary: Package to help people create full-screen text UIs

name: asciimatics
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "asciimatics" %}
{% set version = "1.11.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1d0871133c95fa15c603d471ebb77e39b3389877e2ff2ad5ab3bc906d81b5e8c

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools_scm
  run:
    - python
    - wcwidth
    - pyfiglet >=0.7.2
    - pillow >=2.7.0
    - future
    - pywin32  # [win]

test:
  imports:
    - asciimatics 

about:
  home: http://github.com/peterbrittain/asciimatics
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Package to help people create full-screen text UIs'

  description: |
    Asciimatics is a package to help people create full-screen text UIs 
    (from interactive forms to ASCII animations) on any platform. 
  doc_url: https://asciimatics.readthedocs.io/ 
  dev_url: http://github.com/peterbrittain/asciimatics

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - CurtLH
    - sodre
